Election Code Sec. 254.0401.  AVAILABILITY OF REPORTS ON INTERNET.  (e-1) Before making a report available on the Internet as required by Subsection (b), the authority with whom the report is filed may remove each portion, other than city, state, and zip code, of the address of a person listed as having made a political contribution to the person filing the report.  The address information removed must remain available on the report maintained in the authority's office.
